heading: Agricultural Resources
subheading: Explore comprehensive agriculture websites for education, market updates, and farming solutions
footerNote: Click on any card to expand and view details, then click 'Visit Website' to explore more resources

educationConsulting.title: Agriculture Education Consulting
educationConsulting.desc: Expert guidance for agricultural education programs, training, and professional development for farmers and agricultural professionals.

recruitment.title: Agricultural Recruitment Services
recruitment.desc: Connect with top agricultural job opportunities and recruitment services. Find your next career in agriculture sector.

jobs.title: All Agriculture Jobs in India
jobs.desc: Comprehensive portal for all types of agriculture jobs across India. Browse latest job postings, career advice, and opportunities.

tractorNews.title: Tractor News, Loans & Insurance
tractorNews.desc: Latest updates on tractor models, financing options, insurance plans, and buyer's guide for agricultural machinery.

agTech.title: Agricultural Technologies Updates
agTech.desc: Stay informed about cutting-edge agricultural technologies, innovations, smart farming solutions, and digital agriculture trends.

colleges.title: Agricultural Colleges & Universities
colleges.desc: Information about agricultural colleges, universities, courses, admissions, and educational opportunities in agriculture field.

seedIndustry.title: Seed Industry Updates
seedIndustry.desc: Latest news from seed industry, new varieties, seed technologies, regulations, and market trends in agricultural seeds.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Agriculture News
sustainable.desc: Updates on sustainable farming practices, organic agriculture, eco-friendly methods, and environmental conservation in farming.

tomatoCultivation.title: Tomato Cultivation Guide
tomatoCultivation.desc: Complete guidance on tomato cultivation including planting techniques, care tips, disease management, and harvesting methods.

plantPathology.title: Plant Pathology News
plantPathology.desc: Latest research and news related to plant diseases, pathology, pest management, and crop protection strategies.

marketingNews.title: Agricultural Marketing News
marketingNews.desc: Market intelligence, agricultural marketing strategies, export-import updates, and business opportunities in agriculture.

marketPrices.title: Latest Agriculture Market Prices
marketPrices.desc: Real-time market prices of agricultural commodities, crops, vegetables, and produce across different mandis and markets.

mbaAgriculture.title: MBA in Agriculture Information
mbaAgriculture.desc: Information about MBA programs in agriculture, agribusiness management, admissions, career prospects, and top institutions.

marketingJobs.title: Agricultural Marketing Jobs
marketingJobs.desc: Career opportunities in agricultural marketing sector, sales positions, marketing roles, and business development jobs.

bankingJobs.title: Agricultural Banking Jobs
bankingJobs.desc: Job opportunities in agricultural banking, rural finance, credit services, and financial institutions serving agriculture.

retailers.title: Indian Agriculture Retailers
retailers.desc: Directory of agricultural retailers, input dealers, seed suppliers, fertilizer distributors, and farm equipment dealers.
